DOC.brief_summary: Meniscus does not always heal when sutured. The investigators will make small holes in the meniscus before repair to promote more bleeding. The investigators expect that will help the meniscus to heal better.
DOC.brief_title: Can a Simple Trephination Increase the Heeling Potential for All-inside Meniscal Repair in the Vascular Zone?
DOC.detailed_description: RCT study to evaluate the effect on trephination together with meniscal repair on meniscus healing after repair.
DOC.criteria: Adults who have a meniscus repaired. Meniscus not fit for repair. Patients not fit for the repair regime. Arthrosis > stadie 2 (ICRS). Prior attempt of repair of the meniscus.
